scenario_text.value: All right, that makes everyone.

Time for us to take on the Master once and
for all!
Yes, only first we’ll have to find him.

Nah...looks like he’s found us. Look over
there!
It’s him!
Never, never forgotten...
In my world, your dreams endure forever.
This is the Master?
Yes. I am the true master of this world...

I am its will made manifest, and as its
caretaker, I rule with compassion.
Huh? What are you talking about?!

Dude, I don’t think talking is the answer
here. The guy’s spouting pure nonsense.

Yeah, who cares about having a conversation?!
We know what we’ve gotta do!
Yeah, you’re right!

No doubt about it. That’s our enemy, and we
need to defeat it!

I can feel them... The souls of all the lost
children... They’re inside him.

He covets the souls of children. Uses them to
sustain this world... And he wants mine, too.

He takes their souls? Does that mean he’s got
Shuuji and Ryo in there too?
Yes... He used them to maintain this world.

(So, he’s the one who consumed Shuuji and
Ryo, and now he’s coming after us too.)

(He’s been behind everything, and if we don’t
stop him, he’s going to attack our world.)

(I hate him. I want him to pay for what he’s
done. I went through hell because of him.)

(But there must be some reason he’s done all
this. Is there any way we could talk to him?)
(How do I really feel about the Master?)
He’s the enemy!
I want revenge.
Maybe we could talk?
He’s the enemy.

If we don’t defeat him, both this world and
ours will be destroyed! He’s the enemy!
We have to defeat him, for everyone’s sake!
Yeah! I’m ready to fight! To save the world!
You said it.
I want revenge.
Ryo, Shuuji...and Jijimon.

We can’t let their deaths be in vain! This
ends here and now!

Yeah! I’m ready to fight! I’ll protect you,
Takuma!
I never want to have to feel that pain again!
Could we talk?

Is... Is there no way we can talk this out?
Could you at least tell us why?
Takuma...

It’s no use. This thing doesn’t even know
we’re here.

It’s like a lightning bolt or a storm.
A mindless power seeking only to destroy.
Grr...

Takuma, while I respect your thoughtfulness,
the time for talk is long past.
Let’s end this.
And then go home!

Almost there! Just a bit more, and we’ll
finally be able to go home!

That’s right, we’re going home! All of us
together!
Now, let’s do this!
